items.title: Max Healthcare to invest Rs 170-200 crore in a 130-bed hospital in Dehradun
items.description: The existing hospital in the city is running at an occupancy of over 80 percent, and hence, there is 'dire need to expand the capacity of tertiary care beds in the city', said Max Healthcare. The facility will cater to the healthcare needs of people in Dehradun and surrounding regions.

items.title: Vodafone Idea in talks with private credit funds as bank funding remains elusive
items.description: The struggling telco is in talks with Davidson Kempner, Oaktree and Värde Partners to raise a small tranche of debt

items.title: AI startup Perplexity makes $34.5 billion bid for Google’s Chrome browser
items.description: The unsolicited bid was sent to Alphabet Inc.’s Google on Tuesday morning, a Perplexity spokesperson said

items.title: DGCA issues show cause notice to IndiGo over simulator training lapses, airline responds
items.description: The Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) found that Category C or critical airfield training for around 1,700 pilots, including pilots in command and first officers, was conducted with non-qualified simulators,

items.title: Mahindra boosts South Africa capacity as budget car demand jumps
items.description: Mahindra also sells sports utility vehicles in South Africa including the XUV 3XO, XUV 700, Scorpio-N and Bolero.

items.title: Protean: What should investors do after the sharp fall?
items.description: Not winning the PAN 2.0 mandate has materially increased medium-term earnings risk

items.title: Lemon Tree Hotels: Robust performance; gearing up for next growth phase
items.description: Over the long term, LMNT plans to strengthen its presence in India’s mid-market hotel segment, aiming to scale up to 30,000-40,000 keys

items.title: Data Patterns: The stock show is dependent on order execution
items.description: The company posted a weak quarter but expects to do better, going forward

items.title: Cholamandalam Investment: Is the valuation justified?
items.description: Margin expansion expected in FY26, backed by lower funding cost

items.title: For Fortis, Gleneagles provides both a challenge and an opportunity
items.description: The O&M agreement with Gleneagles will add new clusters to Fortis Healthcare

items.title: VinFast bets on India, Indonesia to win global EV race after US, EU push falters
items.description: The opening of its first overseas assembly plant in India earlier this month is a crucial piece in billionaire owner Pham Nhat Vuong’s Asia pivot

items.title: GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke to step down by year-end after four years at the helm
items.description: Dohmke said he is leaving GitHub to return to his startup roots and launch a new venture.

items.title: Supreme Court reserves verdict on JSW Steel’s Rs 19,700 crore resolution plan for Bhushan Power
items.description: The CoC is seeking Rs 3,569 crore in EBITDA and Rs 2,500 crore in delay-related interest.
